review: Honest review..My baby girl has asthama ..he is such a GOD ..family Dr for us from last 5 years ..bestest thing that u won't find anywhere is if u called him at midnight also 2-3-4-5 O' clock he respond quickly bcoz he has care about child..once I called at 5 O' clock nd he had hurry to catch the flight although he respond me for a minute..n one thing ..money u spent here is same as other pediatrician charged..if u want to see changes in ur baby ..u should follow him with all medications and courses ..he cure my baby from critical condition  2-3 times ..üôèüôè

review: Now my daughter is feeling good and no pimples on her head but still somewhat pimples is there on her forehead. From yesterday only I have started treatment so I will wait 2-3 days for complete recovery of pimples from her forehead. Thank you doctor. I am so thankful to you because 2 years back because of this problem only I went back to Karnataka with my daughter. Now after 2 years we came back to Bombay but again my daughter is same pimples problem on her head, around neck and on her face but now she is feeling good. Thank you so much doctor. I will wait for complete cure.
